column4: can anyone help me, I am following the ATI howto for fglrx, and my X server still won't start. fglrxinfo gives me -> Error: unable to open display :0
should I try aserver-xorg-driver-ati instead of fglrx?
man I might actually just go out and buy a new video card for this machine, what is one that I can be sure wont give me too much trouble?
i didnt have much issues with my ati x1600xt
